# Map Individual Vessels

Date Range: 2023-05-01 to 2023-05-15
```{r make_maps}
map_list <- list()

for (i in 1:10){
   a_vessel <- get_one_vessel(fish_data,i)
   map_list[[i]] <- map_one_vessel(a_vessel)
}

```
